section.title: configuration of schedule module Configure Schedule
section.para: To configure the Schedule module, select the "Configure Schedule" option. The following screen will appear:
When configuring the Schedule module, you are presented with the following options:

varlistentry.term: planned orders numbering of Next Planned Order #

listitem.para: Enter a number to establish the basis for the next Planned Order Number. Any changes made here will be reflected the next time a new Planned Order is created.
Specify a default Calendar to be used when running the "MPS Detail" report.
Select to enable the Buffer Management system. If not selected, the system will be hidden from view.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Cancels any configuration settings, returning you to the application desktop.
Saves the configuration settings, returning you to the application desktop.
